name: Snake
description:
Snake is a massively multiplayer online 3D action game with a third-person view. The objective of the game is to control a cute snake (or snakes) around a map and eat apples, defeating other players to grow the largest and longest in the game.

Player-driven development is at the very core of Snake to make it more fun based on deep insights into audience expectations.

One of its core features is “hardcore lifetime progression”; survival is key. Let the lifetime Snake challenge begin!

Gameplay

Somewhere in the ocean, there is an island where snakes live together happily. Well, actually, that is not the case, never mind. Unlimited delicious apples help snakes grow. And also, do not forget to put your snake(s) to sleep in the pit when you feel it is the right time to do so. Soon, you will discover why.

If your snake is unable to move or is in the water, its length starts to decrease. When its length reaches zero, it dies and loses all of its progress. This is the hardcore part of the game. But, there is a way to secure its progress; Find out how?

Features

  • Various skins and motifs
  • Day and night cycle
  • Camera zoom in/out

Game controls

Keyboard
ESC - Game menu
WAD (or correspondent arrow keys) - Move forward, turn left, turn right
Space - Open snake's mouth when alive otherwise Respawn

Mouse
Free to look
Mouse scroll up/down - Camera zoom in/out

Please refer to our visual presentation (game trailer and screenshots) on Snake’s store page.

We hope you enjoy our game and look forward to playing together. Good luck and have fun!
